item.description: I am currently focused solely on transitioning from my current job to my new one. While it is not a huge task, it is taking a lot of mental energy. item.title: My Way *and* the Highway
item.description: Man makes tools. In turn, tools make a different man through his work. Neither the man nor the tool remains the same; they are forever transformed, locked in a reciprocal process of mutual becoming, thereby perpetually evolving.

item.title: Emptiness
item.description: Clay transforms into pottery through craft, but it’s the emptiness within that makes a pot truly useful. What’s absent can be just as significant as what’s present. This idea originates from the Tao Te Ching, a foundational text of Taoism. (Tzu & Needleman, 1989)
